website_summaries.verdict: The overall best travel bottles in a large pack. Keeps different liquids organized.
pros: Good for drinking liquids and toiletries
Outer casing uses a three-layer design to keep liquids from spilling out while traveling in a bag
Includes a convenient suction cup to hold the bottle to flat surfaces like tiles
cons: Suction cup can lose grip in wet environments

customer_reviews.title: Not for astringent
customer_reviews.text: Great for lotions and soaps, but not for astringents containing salicylic acid. It will form hairlike crystals as it sneaks through the pores in the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! TRAVEL BOTTLES
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel bottles. perfect design in everyway. Very soft silicone easy to squeeze, 3 oz perfect for airline travel, suction cup is wonderful. just stick them to the wall in shower perfect. then to top it off they have pre made labels in cap that you can change to whatever you put in them. Last, the cap is flip top so no need to unscrew anything and it has a spilt seal in the cap so when you flip open the cap you don't have product running out. They could not have designed it better, I have to buy more as my wife, Daughter and Myself just loved these after our 4 day trip to Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: Milford Harris

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, leak-free bottles. Changing the label on each bottle is simple (5 choices - Soap, Shampoo, Cond, Lotion, Sun), and because they are made of silicone, they will not crack with repeated use. I originally received a defective set, and Mylivell immediately contacted me and sent a replacement set. Excellent and responsive customer service, and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I didn't think I would care for them, so I bought a pack with little expectation, but I labeled them, filled them and then used them and... they didn't leak! And the suction cups are AWESOME! So smart! Between the gym and the places I work in the water, I shower away from home a lot, and there is almost never anywhere to put things other than the floor. These suction cups are strong and I just smack the bottle onto the wall, and, bam, wall mounted product! Now I want everything suction cup-able :-D
customer_reviews.author: w0lfgh0st

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: These are handy to travel with. They stay put while showering if using the suction cups, but they don’t stay put for a few days. You do have to open the lid carefully. I tried with one hand while showering and the whole top came off instead of the lid snapping open, and out went my shampoo. The labeling system is great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Reader

customer_reviews.title: Suction concept is great, but fails in reality
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to have everything I was looking for, labels built into the caps, leakproof and suction. The met the mark on everything but the suction. Also, I was unable to get the labels to face the same direction as the flip-tops on the lids. Overall, they worked and met my needs, just didn't measure up to what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are the best! I put these bottles to the test with ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and have tried many different travel bottles. These are the best! I put these bottles to the test with liquids such as mouthwash, coconut oil, etc. The bottles were so durable and leak-proof. They made it through this month's crazy week of traveling in the Caribbean without an issue. The bottles have a suction cup making them easy to use in the shower and a loop making them easy to carry anywhere. They are 3 oz in size (perfect for carrying on the plane) and I plan to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the four bottles has already lost its seal. The part that keeps the liquid inside just peeled right off. I turned the bottle upside down and the liquid just poured out. I don’t see a way to contact the vendor on here and will change my review if they see and remedy the problem. The others seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: This is long overdue but I have to say that the company replaced my items free of charge and the second set of travel containers have fared much better. Props to the company and my apologies for correcting this review so late. These leaked all over our toiletry bag 1 hour after packing them and applying close to no pressure. I've used similar products with no issues but these were not up to snuff.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Broadhurst

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a short 5 days trip, after doing extended research , I decided to purchase these traveling sizes. It does not leak at all , I bought these to store my kid strawberry syrups, the shampoo and the dish soap Liquid to clean my babies milk bottles
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: These leak - throwing them away
customer_reviews.text: Labels are a bit difficult to set, but the bottles themselves seem well made and have worked well so far. Update: after leaking all over my travel case twice, I’m downgrading this junk to one star, and looking for a replacement. You had ONE job - don’t leak. You failed - goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I add a small carabiner and fill with sunscreen, and attach to my PFD while kayaking. Keeps me on the water longer and means if I capsize, my sunscreen won’t float away downstream!
customer_reviews.author: C. McGrady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design Travel Bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little travel bottles. Perfect for air travel because they meet all requirements. They have a leakproof design so I don't have to worry about them when they are in my bag or luggage. Also, they have changeable labels on the bottles depending on what you put in them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality bottles but too big. I wanted to be able to hang one on a lanyard to fill with hand sanitizer so I probably misjudged how big it would be for the ounces it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Much Fun

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for campground showers. hooked them all to my laynard.. and off to the showers.
customer_reviews.author: Joudee

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bottles, don’t seem to leak. Probably great for shampoos and like items. I bought for special hand santizer and I think the consistency isn’t the best for me to use these. So good product, but not for what I’m using it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. While the suction isn't tight enough to stay on the wall for very long, it does help to stabilize them on a shelf. Other than that, they are everything they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I love these and they are so convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many other travel products that would always break crack or just not hold enough. I found these and wanted to try because silicone is flexible. I love these and they are so convenient. You can have them stick to the sides of the shower and get the liquids out while still sticking to the wall. These are the best and I am ordering more
customer_reviews.author: A. Street

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak but hard to open!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these a few times and they have not leaked which is wonderful. Only issue I have is when bottles are suctioned to the wall the lid is very hard to snap open. It wants to pull off the bottle completely which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bottle set
customer_reviews.text: It even has a dot on the front to show u where to apply pressure to make it stick to your bathroom wall. This item is convenient and the suction works really well, better than all the other travel bottles ive tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ausbrod

customer_reviews.title: elaborate
customer_reviews.text: these bottles are great but dont put hand sanitizer in it. For some reason, the hand sanitizer keep evaporating in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Samnang Bo

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: They hold product with out leakage for travel very well.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great travel product. Great price. Never leaks.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I travelled around South America for months with everything packed tightly in my backpack. These never leaked in anyway and I made it through airport security with absolutely no issues. They hold quite a bit of product as well. I didn’t even use it all up in the months I was gone. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Menzer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good, but they leak slightly
customer_reviews.text: I assemble and screwed on the caps correctly, and they generally keep liquids in, but leak very slightly. I can see how this can happen as it's not obvious, but they do leak a bit. Not ideal for travelling and backpacking where you want to make sure that your kit stays dry and not slimed.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple versions/brands of these silicon bottles. All have worked fine but I will say, this set is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: RCJHKU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gym. I like that you can squeeze them, lots of travel bottles are hard so there ended up being product you can’t get out and it goes to waste
customer_reviews.author: Becky wilson

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for travel. First off, I had one bottle leak. The suction power was horrible and would only last about an hour or so. Last, after my 3 week trip, I realized the color of the bottles began to leak and mix within the contents of the bottle. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tavelled with them yet but I like the look and feel. I like that you can empty and fill easily and the suction feature is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: pws

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This time it was super cheap! Finally, I received the treasure I needed. The goods are very good and the price is very low. This set of travel luggage is convenient to carry and fast to use. I will continue to buy the products of this family when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael palacios

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great. They do not leak and they stick to the shower wall in our camper perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CeJai

customer_reviews.title: These are great. One did react to my hair oil and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One did react to my hair oil and exploded, but the company reimbursed me for it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kbert

customer_reviews.title: A traveler's best friend! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome Very handy. They are easy to fill, having the labels on the cap so you can identify what's in it is super handy! The material is durable, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill, easy to clean, convenient size, no problems with leaking. I don't find the suction cups to be particularly great (they fall down a lot - even when using completely flat surfaces). But other than that, they work as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: LM12

customer_reviews.title: These are great bottles! They're the first ones I've ever had ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great bottles! They're the first ones I've ever had that didn't leak at all! I bought only four, but I will purchase more for my next trip.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used these a few time and the contents get stuck and dont come out appropriately. Wouldn't buy again

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go cheap. These aren’t a good choice...

customer_reviews.title: It is convenient to carry
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient to carry and the washing effect is silky and smooth. The goods purchased this time, like the introduction, will choose this travel outfit in the future. It is really very useful.

customer_reviews.title: They worked great. The suction cups stayed put all week and ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these with both the suction cup back and the small carabiner clips on a recent vacation. They worked great. The suction cups stayed put all week and they held more than enough of shampoo/conditioner/etc.

customer_reviews.title: I love these. The suction cups are a really nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The suction cups are a really nice feature. Sometimes it squirts out a LOT of product (more than I might want in a given moment), but other than that, basically perfect and exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked terribly. I was so disappointed

customer_reviews.title: They do adjust for the lable on what is in there.
customer_reviews.text: I like for grand kids to use when going to shower when camping.

customer_reviews.title: Only use on normal tile but still worked
customer_reviews.text: i BOUGHT THESE FOR my husband who goes out of town for work. The motel he used didn't have the normal tile so the bottles kept falling down , but they didn't leak at all and he was able to use them so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree B.

customer_reviews.title: Really durable feeling, and handy
customer_reviews.text: Sucker cups makes these super handy for storage. Also like to use mine for backpacking

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, labels are nice, silicone is not slippery when wet, the suction cup is nice and they don't leak in my backpack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked so well my wife left them in the hotel.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travelling, this is something you must have. Otherwise, just too much trouble to check a bag just for a lotion..

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works. I dropped it several time (4ft falls) and didn't break. So far no leaks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Leak, Meh Suction Cup
customer_reviews.text: Small & squishy (so easier to pack), didn't leak. She suction cup isn't particularly good, but I also don't care about that part personally.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were great, no issues with leaking. The only negative was the suction cup backs. The bottles would fall off the shower wall in the middle of the night and scare the crap out of me! Not really an issue if you just set the bottles on the counter. Overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best ever!! Does not leak at all. I’ve tried so many travel bottles, these are the only ones that really work. Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.text: They leaked. Fortunately, they were in a ziplock bag inside my suitcase.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from 12 days in Spain and used these for shampoo. They worked out very well. I had them in a zip lock bag and none of them leaked. I recommend them.

customer_reviews.text: Great design. The suction cup was an added bonus I didn't except!

customer_reviews.title: Great for short trips

customer_reviews.title: very glad I bought

customer_reviews.title: the construction is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Finally no more leaking. I live above sea level and when traveling away from home, toiletries tend to leak due to air pressure differences. Although I've traveling to higher altitudes with these, the construction is perfect for my needs.

customer_reviews.text: I used these on my recent trip to Europe and packed one of them with Aryuvedic massage oil - they did not leak. I really like that they suction cup to the wall of the shower for easy use.

customer_reviews.title: If you use shampoo or body gel, these things belong in your gym bag and travel kit.
customer_reviews.text: These are Great. I have them up on hooks in my shower, and also have a couple in my gym bag. If you use shampoo or body gel, these things belong in your gym bag and travel kit.

customer_reviews.title: all of these were great, if your having problems with it not sealing ...
customer_reviews.text: all of these were great, if your having problems with it not sealing then take off both tops to the plastic container and re-align the plastic, put both tops back on and it is fixed!

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be just like the more expensive brands I have used

A bit difficult to turn the product selection dial...But so far works well. Will post an update after I have used longer and all of them.

customer_reviews.text: Was surprised how useful they were for a 10 day trip. Part of trip was a 4 day cruise and perfect for the tiny showers on the ship, as there was no room to place shampoo so the suction cups worked great and out of the way. No problem with leakage.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good seal between cap and bottle
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to squeeze which was important since my husband has hand issues. They do stick to shower walls which is nice. But the cap end just pops into the silicone part so it's not very sturdy. I am worried about the end popping off. My husband had one that leaked a little. When I went to open one of the caps the whole end popped off. I bought them for camping but will probably still put them in plastic bags out of fear of leakage. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacylooshus

product_meta.title: Mylivell Travel Bottles Set,Leakproof Silicone,TSA-Approved Portable Travel Size Accessories, Squeezable and Refillable Bottle Containers Shampoo, Conditioner, Lotion, Toiletries 4 Pack 3 oz
feature_bullets: LEAK-PROOF DESIGN - Each lid contains 3-layers, which implies that no liquid will leak out even the product is placed upside down. You do not need to worry that they will spill in your luggage.
WITH LOOP AND SUCTION CUP - The travel bottles contain a loop and a suction cup on the them, which makes them easy to hang, or attach them on the shower wall.

ADJUSTABLE LABELS - Silicone travel bottles have labels (Sun, Cond, Shamp, Lotion, Soap, and a blank one) on the cap which you can rotate to adjust the label to your preference, or write your own labels according to your requirements.
SUPERIOR QUALITY - Our travel toiletry bottle set is made of 100% BPA free food grade silicone which makes it safe for food. Durable, unbreakable and approved to carry in the airplane.

CONVENIENT TRAVEL ACCESSORIES - Silicone travel bottle set allows you to lighten your load while still being able to bring your necessities such as shampoo, conditioner, and lotion. The bottle size is 3 OZ, which is large enough for a 7-day trip. Very handy for travelling. A great mother's day gift.
